DOC.brief_summary: We explore use Huperzine A patient sustained moderate severe Traumatic Brain Injury . We aim determine whether Huperzine A , compare placebo , would effect memory function TBI . Additionally , aim determine whether use Huperzine A patient change brain activity ( indexed EEG Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation - TMS ) , reduce prevalence/frequency post-traumatic seizure . We also aim evaluate safety Huperzine A population compare placebo .
